## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fdf4f44f0e2251feb64569ec5e6632d61028a3700988bf3e904d2b70ae3955f4)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'redux-saga-task-cancel-rce' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
